returns._0: Address of newly created collateral pool
True if the corresponding collateral pool exists

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._index: Index of collateral pool in allCollateralPools

returns._0: True if collateral pool is removed successfully

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

CreateCollateralPool(string,address,uint.notice: Emits when a collateral pool is created

RemoveCollateralPool(address,address).notice: Emits when a collateral pool is removed

constructor.notice: This contract creates collateral pool for tokens

isCollateral(address).notice: Checks whether the token is accepted as collateral or not
